page.title: 04 MEDIA IN OUR HOMES
page.content: {Media, Television, Radio and Videos {Magazines, Papers and Books In this area reading is very popular. Most people buy magazines, papers and books regularly and think that the prices are very reasonable. Very few read for educational purposes, most read for leisure only. Drama, romance and comedy being the favourite subjects. An item to notice that people are very sceptical of the news they read.{Videos }A very high proportion of the people have videos. So the relatively new two video shops that have opened up are a welcome addition to the local services.{T.V {And Radio. }Everybody nowadays has t.v. and radios. The t.v. is watched for a variety of interests, while radio seems to be listened to mainly for music. Although a lot of hours are spent watching the t.v.
